items.sentence: That is the same umbrella that I found on the bus.
I\'m going to have you read the letter to me, Tom.
I believe it\'s my duty to protect these children.
You need to stop ignoring email messages from Tom.
You obviously love Tom and he obviously loves you.
You of all people should understand how Tom feels.
Tom wears long sleeves when working in the garden.
I suspect Tom did that just to get some attention.
I suspect that Tom expects me to help him do that.
I suspect that Tom has already left for Australia.
